projects.title: Meal Recipe Finder
projects.description: The Meal Recipe Finder Project.User can search any Text, then it will auto suggest the recipe.You can get all the information of recipe and save it for future reference.

projects.title: Advance Printer Software
projects.description: The most expanded Project I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and Partnered with company mentor to learn best practices in software design. Developed the Dashboard which will work At All times, Display current status of Printers that are connected to Monolith and Show key health parameters of Printers so that Printers are operational all times.Developed the Edit Job Settings in which worked on edit all Job related Settings. Job Settings can be saved as a Preset to apply on other Jobs.

projects.title: Diaries Manager
projects.description: In Diaries Manager app you can define the privacy of your diary as private and Public and also you can filter the diaries which are public and also can write diary for a friend.
